name: ridgebot
label: Ridge Security RidgeBot
description: RidgeBot validates security vulnerabilities in your organization by using real POC codes to exploit the vulnerability. This connector facilitates automated operation such as creating and executing penetration testing tasks.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server_url
fields.description: Specify the RidgeBot server URL to which you can connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: User Token
fields.name: user_token
fields.description: Specify an Identity Token used to access the RidgeBot endpoint to which you can connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.
fields.name: verify_ssl

operations.title: Get Task Info
operations.description: Retrieves information about an existing task such as start time, end time, status, etc.

parameters.title: Task ID
parameters.description: Specify an existing RidgeBot Task ID for which you want to retrieve details from RidgeBot server.
parameters.tooltip: Specify an existing RidgeBot Task ID for which you want to retrieve details from RidgeBot server.
parameters.name: task_id

operations.title: Get Task Statistics
operations.description: Retrieves finding statistics of an existing task such number of assets found, number of vulnerabilities found per risk category, etc.

parameters.title: Task ID
parameters.description: Specify an existing RidgeBot Task ID for which you want to retrieve details from RidgeBot server.
parameters.tooltip: Specify an existing RidgeBot Task ID for which you want to retrieve details from RidgeBot server.
parameters.name: task_id

operations.title: Generate And Download
operations.description: Generates and downloads penetration testing report from a completed task by specifying the Task ID.

parameters.title: Task ID
parameters.description: Specify an existing RidgeBot Task ID for which you want to retrieve details from RidgeBot server.
parameters.tooltip: Specify an existing RidgeBot Task ID for which you want to retrieve details from RidgeBot server.
parameters.name: task_id

operations.title: Stop Task
operations.description: Stops a running or unfinished task by specifying the Task ID.

parameters.title: Task ID
parameters.description: Specify an existing RidgeBot Task ID for which you want to retrieve details from RidgeBot server.
parameters.tooltip: Specify an existing RidgeBot Task ID for which you want to retrieve details from RidgeBot server.
parameters.name: task_id

operations.title: Create Task
operations.description: Creates a default intranet or web penetration testing task.

parameters.title: Name of Scan
parameters.description: Specify a name or title for the task to be created.
parameters.tooltip: Specify a name or title for the task to be created.
parameters.name: name

parameters.title: Type of Scan
parameters.description: Choose the type of scan to be created. Either Intranet or Web Penetration Testing task.
parameters.tooltip: Choose the type of scan to be created. Either Intranet or Web Penetration Testing task.
parameters.name: temp_id

parameters.title: Targets
parameters.description: Specifies the target(s) for the scan.
parameters.tooltip: Specifies the target(s) for the scan.
parameters.name: targets
